cleaned_text: COVID-19 Vaccination for Children Information for Jurisdictions, Healthcare Providers, Pharmacists, and Community Partners [COVID-19 vaccine equity](/coronavirus/2019-ncov/community/health-equity/vaccine-equity.html) is when all people who are eligible including children have fair access to COVID-19 vaccination. Use these resources to help children get vaccinated against COVID-19. For the best protection, CDC recommends COVID-19 vaccines for everyone [6 months and older](/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/stay-up-to-date.html#children). COVID-19 vaccines available for children include: [Pediatric COVID-19 Operational Planning Guidance](/vaccines/covid-19/covid19-vaccination-guidance.html) Find guidance to inform planning for COVID-19 vaccine programs and distribution of COVID-19 vaccine for children.
